archetypes.description: Warriors are the frontline fighters who absorb punishment and deal devastating melee damage.
archetypes.selectionText: You are the shield between the innocent and the horror. When others flee, you advance. Your body is a weapon, your will is unbreakable.
archetypes.playstyleDescription: Stand in the front, absorb damage, protect allies

archetypes.description: Skirmishers excel at mobility and precision strikes, weaving in and out of combat.
archetypes.selectionText: Speed is survival. Strike fast, strike true, and be gone before they know you were there.

archetypes.description: Mystics channel the corrupted Aether to unleash devastating magical attacks from range.
archetypes.selectionText: The Aether flows through you like a river of broken logic. Others fear its touch; you have learned to direct its chaos.
archetypes.playstyleDescription: Ranged magical damage, crowd control, Aether management

archetypes.description: Adepts excel at support, utility, and making the most of limited resources.
archetypes.selectionText: While others rely on strength or magic, you rely on knowledge, skill, and preparation.
archetypes.playstyleDescription: Support allies, maximize resources, utility skills
